meanings.sent1: She redraws the picture to make it better.
meanings.sent2: He always redraws his sketches until they look perfect.
meanings.sent3: The artist redraws the cat with a funny hat on its head.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination redraws reality into a colorful dream.
meanings.sent5: The student redraws the map to remember it better.

meanings.definition: To make a new drawing of (something).
meanings.sent1: He redraws the landscape with more details.
meanings.sent2: She redraws the portrait to capture the likeness accurately.
meanings.sent3: The child redraws the sun with a big smile on its face.
meanings.sent4: His mind redraws memories like a skilled artist.
meanings.sent5: The architect redraws the building plans for better clarity.

meanings.definition: To draw (something) again in a different way.
meanings.sent1: She redraws the flower with brighter colors.
meanings.sent2: He redraws the tree in a more abstract style.
meanings.sent3: The cartoonist redraws the character with a funny expression.
meanings.sent4: His heart redraws the love story with a twist of fate.
meanings.sent5: The designer redraws the logo for a fresh look.
